title: Positive Impressions
text:
Leonardo.AI initially aimed at game asset content creation has quicky evolved into become one of the most popular generative AI startups. With focus in creative industries, including gaming, advertising, fashion, and architecture.

It hosts several impressive features such as:
  • Text to Image Generation
  • 3D Texture Generation
  • Image to Image Generation
  • Live Canvas and much moreâ€¦
Along with the features, Leonardo.AI is also set out to create an enormous community of engaged users who are using the tool to harness their creativity through digital art and design.
